content.p1: BrendR is part of EndResults and focuses on developing smart, scalable solutions for e-commerce businesses.
content.p2: Our strength lies in combining AI and automation to accelerate processes and enhance customer experiences.
content.p3: Founded in 2025 by Clinton End, BrendR builds on nearly a decade of Clintonâ€™s experience as a Product Owner and E-commerce Manager, leading projects across retail, fashion, and technology. His mission: to make digital growth accessible and sustainable for every business.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FiT, from integration to privacy and pricing

seo.title: FAQ â€“ FiT by Brendr | AI-powered virtual fitting room for webshops
seo.description: Discover everything about FiT, the AI-powered virtual fitting session for webshops. Learn how FiT works, how to integrate it, pricing, and how it increases your conversion.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Can't find your question? Contact our team, we're happy to help!

questions.q: What is FiT?
questions.a: FiT is an AI-powered virtual try-on experience that lets customers see themselves with your products. By uploading a single photo, they instantly experience how clothing, accessories or other items look on them, directly on your product page.

questions.q: How does FiT work?
questions.a: Customers upload a clear photo of themselves. Our AI combines that photo with the product image and generates a realistic result in seconds. This provides a personal try-on experience without leaving the store.

questions.q: Who is FiT for?
questions.a: FiT is designed for webshops and brands that want to offer a unique, interactive shopping experience. Whether you sell fashion, glasses, jewelry, sports items or even vehicles. FiT makes it personal.

questions.q: How do I integrate FiT into my webshop?
questions.a: Very easily. Add a single line of code to your product pages and the FiT button will appear automatically. From there, customers can start their try-on immediately. No complex setup or technical knowledge required.

questions.q: Does FiT work on all ecommerce platforms?
questions.a: Yes. FiT is compatible with virtually any platform, including Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento and custom websites.

questions.q: Can I adapt the look & feel to my brand?
questions.a: Certainly. From the Premium plan you can hide the FiT logo in the results and with our Enterprise subscription you van even align colors and texts with your brand style.

questions.q: Are my photos stored or shared?
questions.a: FiT treats all images with strict confidentiality. The photos you upload are temporarily processed to generate try-on images and then securely stored in your personal account within our protected database. If youâ€™d like your photos to be removed, you can request permanent deletion at any time.

questions.q: Are real people involved in the process?
questions.a: No. Everything is fully automated by our AI models. There is no human intervention.

questions.q: Is FiT GDPR-compliant?
questions.a: Yes. We comply with European privacy legislation. All data is securely stored within the EU and can be completely deleted upon request.

questions.q: How can I delete my account and erase all my data?
questions.a: You can close your account via your profile page in the FiT app. Steps: 1) Go to /customer/profile 2) Scroll to 'Close account and delete data' 3) Click the red button 'Close account and delete data' 4) Confirm in the pop-up. Note: this is irreversible, previous FiT sessions and images will be permanently lost.

questions.q: What does FiT deliver for my webshop?
questions.a: FiT increases customer engagement, trust and conversion. Customers who see themselves with your products make purchase decisions faster and return less often.

questions.q: How fast are images generated?
questions.a: On average within 30 to 40 seconds. The underlying technology is evolving and we expect further speed improvements over time.

questions.q: Can I measure results?
questions.a: Yes, but insights vary per plan. Starter: counter of total FiT sessions with date range filter. Basic: everything from Starter + unique users + overview of last 4 sessions. Premium: everything from Basic + full session overview (user gender, items, date, PDP link). Enterprise: everything from Premium + conversion tracking (e.g., Google Analytics).

questions.q: How much does FiT cost?
questions.a: FiT offers different plans based on try-on sessions and features. There is a free Starter plan to test right away. See current plans on our pricing page.

questions.q: What happens when I reach my limit?
questions.a: You can easily add extra session bundles or upgrade to a higher plan. This way you remain in control of your costs.

questions.q: Can I try FiT for free first?
questions.a: Yes. With the Starter plan you can try FiT for free on one webshop and perform up to 50 try-on sessions per month.

questions.q: Do you offer assistance with installation?
questions.a: Yes. Our team is happy to help with the initial implementation and testing phase. You will also receive clear documentation and sample code.

questions.q: I have a technical problem. How do I get help?
questions.a: Via the FiT dashboard you can contact our support department directly. We usually respond within one business day.

questions.q: How can I contact the FiT team?
questions.a: Send an email to support@brendr.io or use the contact form on the website (/contact).

questions.q: What makes FiT different from traditional virtual fitting rooms?
questions.a: Many tools try to calculate sizes or build 3D models. FiT focuses on simplicity and experience; customers immediately see themselves with the product, without entering sizes or creating an avatar.

questions.q: Does FiT only work for clothing?
questions.a: No. FiT supports multiple categories such as fashion, shoes, jewelry, glasses, motorcycle helmets, bicycles and even car parts.

hero.title: Integrate FiT into your webshop in minutes
hero.subtitle: Adding FiT is as simple as it sounds. Within a minute your customers can start their first virtual fitting session.

quickStart.title: Get started even faster
quickStart.subtitle: We recommend starting with the free Starter plan to experience the integration and customer response.

support.title: Need help with the integration?
support.subtitle: Our support team is happy to help you with the installation

s1.title: Copy your personal widget code
s1.desc: In your FiT dashboard youâ€™ll find your unique API key and Widget Code. Copy the full script line from the Widget Code field.
s1.tipText: This code contains your personal API key and makes the FiT button appear automatically on your product pages.

s2.title: Paste the code into your webshop

p1.before: Paste the script just above the closing
p1.after: tag of your webshop, or on the product detail page where you want to show the FiT button.

s2.p2: Do you use a CMS or e-commerce platform like Shopify, WooCommerce or Magento? Then you can easily add the script via a "Custom HTML" or "Theme code" section in your editor.

s3.title: Done!
s3.desc: Once youâ€™ve added the script, the orange FiT button appears automatically on your product pages. Customers can start a fitting session instantly, no extra configuration or technical knowledge required.
s3.cardText: The FiT button is now live on your webshop and customers can start their first virtual fitting session right away.

optional.title: Optional: Personalize your FiT experience
optional.p1: Want to align FiT branding with your brand? From the Premium plan you can hide the BrendR watermark in FiT results. With the Enterprise plan you can fully customize the FiT widget to match your brand, including your own logo and colors.
optional.noteText: The FiT button itself has a fixed design to maintain recognizability and consistency.
